mapper.sql: qi.id as qiId,time,qid,data_zhengChang,Design_carrier, direction, GJcollection, V_in_all, mV_in_zhu, mV_in_bing, mV_in_diao_zhu, mV_in_diao_bing, Hz_in_low_zhu, Hz_in_low_bing, GJ_drive_zhu, GJ_drive_bing, GJ_rear_collection_zhu, GJ_rear_collection_bing, baojing_zhu, baojing_bing, V_out_zhu, V_out_bei, mA_out_zhu, mA_out_bei, Hz_up_zhu, Hz_up_bei, Hz_down_zhu, Hz_down_bei, Hz_low_zhu, Hz_low_bei, FBJ_drive_zhu, FBJ_drive_bei, FBJ_collection_zhu, FBJ_collection_bei, V_songduan_Cable, mA_songduan_Cable, V_shouduan_Cable_host, V_shouduan_Cable_spare, mA_shouduan_Cable, mA_Cable_JBP, A_longIn_JBP, A_longOut_JBP, A_shortIn_JBP, A_shortOut_JBP, T_JBP, mA_Cable_FBP, A_longIn_FBP, A_longOut_FBP, A_shortIn_FBP, A_shortOut_FBP, T_FBP, A_longIn_FBA_zhu, A_longIn_FBA_diao, A_longOut_FBA_zhu, A_longOut_FBA_diao, A_shortIn_FBA_zhu, A_shortIn_FBA_diao, A_shortOut_FBA_zhu, A_shortOut_FBA_diao, A_longIn_JBA_zhu, A_longIn_JBA_diao, A_longOut_JBA_zhu, A_longOut_JBA_diao, A_shortIn_JBA_zhu, A_shortIn_JBA_diao, A_shortOut_JBA_zhu, A_shortOut_JBA_diao, qi.yuliu as qiYuliu, qb.id as qbId, qb.quDuanYunYing_name, qb.typeid
mapper.select: SELECT qi.*, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_info qi, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE qi.qid = qb.id AND qi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT qi.* FROM mro_quduan_info qi, mro_quduan_base qd WHERE qi.qid = qd.id AND DATE(qi.time) = DATE(#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
SELECT ${name} FROM mro_quduan_info qi, mro_quduan_base qd WHERE qi.qid = qd.id AND DATE_FORMAT ( qi.time, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S" ) = DATE_FORMAT("${format}", "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S")

select ${shuxingname} from mro_quduan_info qi, mro_quduan_base qb where qi.qid=qb.id and qb.quDuanYunYing_name="${quduanname}" and DATE_FORMAT(qi.time,"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S") BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT("${starttime}", "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S") and DATE_FORMAT("${endtime}", "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S")

SELECT qb.typeid, qi.Design_carrier, qi.V_out_zhu, qi.V_out_bei, qi.mA_out_zhu, qi.mA_out_bei, qi.Hz_up_zhu, qi.Hz_up_bei, qi.Hz_down_zhu, qi.Hz_down_bei, qi.Hz_low_zhu, qi.Hz_low_bei, qi.FBJ_drive_zhu, qi.FBJ_drive_bei, qi.FBJ_collection_zhu, qi.FBJ_collection_bei, sb.sb_name FROM mro_quduan_info qi, mro_shebei sb, mro_quduan_base qb WHERE sb.id = qb.sid AND qi.qid = qb.id AND qi.qid = #{id} GROUP BY sb.sb_name
